content: pumpkin party about plan on knitting several of these adorable pumpkins they re so fun to make you ll start by casting on just 10 stitches and joining to work in the round work a few increase rounds before you begin the pattern stitch a k3 p2 rib for the body of the pumpkin then a few decrease rounds then use the tail to thread through the remaining stitches now you re ready to stuff your pumpkin with your choice of stuffing and give it a stem see suggested materials repeat about 20 times and you ll have a pumpkin patch knitting pattern pumpkin party difficulty based on skill levels
